title: What 8 wars did Trump say he ended? He texted it to Norway’s prime minister
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's texts with Jonas Gahr Støre of Norway about Greenland were made public. He said he ended 8 wars. What is he referring to?

title: US, European countries send troops to Greenland amid Trump's threats
shortDescription: The U.S. military announced aircraft would soon arrive at Pituffik Space Base in Greenland, while stressing it is part of a "long-planned" exercise.

title: Extremist rhetoric has gone mainstream under Trump

title: Trump claims Denmark cannot protect Greenland

shortDescription: At the end of President Donald Trump's first year of his second term, Americans share their thoughts on his leadership.

title: Trump threatens tariffs on French wine, champagne over Board of Peace
shortDescription: Trump said he would consider steep tariffs on French wines if the country's president doesn't join a new Board of Peace to oversee war-torn Gaza.

title: Trump admin asks judge to allow ongoing ICE operations in Minnesota
shortDescription: The Department of Justice responded to a lawsuit from Minnesota and the Twin Cities that sought to expel thousands of federal officers from the state.

title: Donald Trump signs MLK Day proclamation, faces criticism from some groups
